snippet: The quest for Zoey, a mutt that ran away in Central Park, spanned a week and several Manhattan neighborhoods.
abstract: Dr Diana B Kirschner spent seven days and nights searching all over Manhattan with friends and family for her dog Zoey, who ran away during an outing in Central Park; eventually finds dog with help of a stranger responding to her fliers.
lead_paragraph: The quest for Zoey, a mutt that ran away in Central Park, spanned a week and several Manhattan neighborhoods.

headline.seo: Odds Slim for Finding Dog Lost in Manhattan
headline.main: A Dog Is Lost; Hope Is Found
headline.print_headline: A Dog Is Lost; Hope Is Found
